org.sql: SELECT spree_taxons.* FROM spree_taxons INNER JOIN spree_products_taxons ON spree_taxons.id = spree_products_taxons.taxon_id INNER JOIN spree_taxonomies ON spree_taxonomies.id = spree_taxons.taxonomy_id WHERE spree_products_taxons.product_id = "$1" AND spree_taxonomies.store_id = "$2"

rewrites.sql: SELECT spree_taxons.* FROM spree_taxons INNER JOIN spree_products_taxons ON spree_taxons.id = spree_products_taxons.taxon_id INNER JOIN spree_taxonomies ON spree_taxonomies.id = spree_taxons.taxonomy_id WHERE spree_products_taxons.product_id = "$1" AND spree_taxonomies.store_id = "$2" LIMIT 1
